SEARCH
Package com.cinemacrit.platform.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.cinemacrit.platform.controllers.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for managing user-related actions such as profile management, changing user information (avatar, name, email, password), and account deletion.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      public UserController()
      Default constructor. This constructor is automatically provided by Spring Framework for dependency injection.

  • Method Details

    • getProfile

      @GetMapping("/profile") public String getProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the user profile page with the user's details and reviews. Retrieves the user's profile information, associated reviews, and movie titles and adds them to the model for rendering in the view.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to be used by the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to be rendered ("user-profile")

    • uploadAvatar

      @PostMapping("/upload-avatar") public String uploadAvatar(@RequestParam("avatar") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile avatar)
      Handles the upload of a new avatar image for the user. The uploaded avatar image is converted to a Base64 string and stored in the user's profile.
      Parameters:
      avatar - the avatar image file uploaded by the user
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to the user's profile page after the avatar is updated

    • changeName

      @PostMapping("/change-name") public String changeName(@RequestParam("name") String name)
      Handles the update of the user's username. The new username is stored in the user's profile and updated in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the new username provided by the user
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to the user's profile page after the username is updated

    • changeEmail

      @PostMapping("/change-email") public String changeEmail(@RequestParam("email") String email)
      Handles the update of the user's email address. The new email is stored in the user's profile and updated in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - the new email address provided by the user
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to the user's profile page after the email is updated

    • changePassword

      @PostMapping("/change-password") public String changePassword(@RequestParam("currentPassword") String currentPassword, @RequestParam("newPassword") String newPassword)
      Handles the update of the user's password. The current password is verified, and if correct, the user's password is updated.
      Parameters:
      currentPassword - the user's current password for verification
      newPassword - the new password to be set for the user
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to the user's profile page after the password is updated
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the current password is incorrect

    • deleteAccount

      @PostMapping("/delete") public String deleteAccount()
      Handles the deletion of the user's account. All reviews associated with the user are updated to reflect the deletion, and the user is removed from the database. The user is then logged out, and redirected to the login page with an account deletion message.
      Returns:
      a redirect URL to the login page after the account is deleted
